title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Spatial Ability Development Through Digital Game-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic domain knowledge in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex environmental structures with 80% accuracy using 3D spatial modeling games.
Learners successfully design spatial problem-solving strategies applicable to real-world scenarios at least four times through in-game simulation tasks.
Based on learning analytics data, learners can identify three or more of their own spatial cognition patterns and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
